thread.section_title: BlogPress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlogPress | theblogpress.com
thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text: I was looking all over the internet to find ways to start blogging. Blog Press was the only one that offered support. I'm glad I took the leap to start blogging and to do it with Blog Press! They have been nothing but amazing and supportive! Anytime I need help or have a question, they are always there to help! Very happy with Blog Press and can't wait to see where my blogging takes me!
